name: Crucifixia
description:
You awaken at the bottom of a sewerage pit in a medieval monastery, having miraculously survived being thrown down there by evil rapist monks in the 13th century. But you aren't the only thing the church threw down there and forgot about! You find two ancient arcane weapons - the Crucifixia - one is a flame-throwing crucifix that has a hidden crossbow and the other is a morphing stone hammer that elongates into a primitive club.

If you hold trigger on the hammer and touch it to the cruci-bow's flame you can fire stakes into the walls, allowing you to climb up out of the pit and wreak revenge upon the priests who threw you down there...

Explore the dank, dark recesses and beware of the priests lurking in the vault above you once you manage to climb your way out!

This game mixes melee with shooter, dungeon crawler with dungeon climber and has unique mechanics as well as frightening enemies.
